duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Management Team in the setup, merchandising, pack-up, and teardown of a seasonal store.
Responsible for maintaining Guest Services as per Company Standards.
Generate sales, sign waving, general housekeeping, merchandising, signing, pricing, POS operations, and loss prevention.
Assist in climbing ladders, setting up fixtures, lifting/moving up to 50 pounds, and may require 8 hours of standing/walking.
